name: Pinkpop

config_properties.name: Pinkpop
config_properties.description: The longest-running annual music festival in the Netherlands, held in Landgraaf since 1970.

ai_profile:
**Pinkpop 2026 Festival Profile**  

Pinkpop 2026 brings together a diverse lineup of 32 artists, showcasing a vibrant mix of genres and styles. Alternative Rock takes center stage with eight acts, closely followed by Pop and Indie Rock, reflecting the festival’s commitment to delivering a balance of mainstream appeal and niche subcultures. With genres ranging from Electropop and Post-Punk to Grunge and R&B, the lineup promises something for every music lover. Notably, there are no DJs this year, emphasizing live performances and band-driven energy.  

The festival highlights an international roster, led by the United Kingdom and the United States, each contributing nine acts, while the Netherlands proudly represents seven homegrown artists. Canada, Germany, Australia, and others round out the global mix. In terms of gender representation, male artists dominate the lineup (20), but female (8) and mixed-gender (4) acts ensure a more inclusive atmosphere. However, diversity in terms of people of color remains minimal, with only one artist identified as POC.  

With an average artist rating of 6.88, the lineup leans towards solid mid-tier acts, with a few standout performers rated 9 or higher. The festival’s eclectic programming and emphasis on international and genre diversity continue to define Pinkpop as a space where alternative and mainstream music intersect. Fans can look forward to discovering fresh sounds while enjoying established favorites in this dynamic musical celebration.
